amendment.description: To provide for a managers' amendment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2227 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2227 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S16183) To provide for a managers' amendment.
